column5: Hi all, I have dreamed since a small boy about taking the fishing trip of a lifetime.  Basically, I want wilderness and the best fishing I have ever imagined...mainly walleye.  I am considering Eddie North's camp, but am looking for suggestions.  Spending the money to go would be a stretch for me, so I want to make it totally worth it.  I am not looking for frills...just awesome fishing.  Thanks.
The walleye is pretty much non-stop up there, basically we fish for them when we are taking a break from pike fishing.
